message.body: hey sisyphus, how's your monday going?
Not bad, headed home from work, north central FL. Where are you?
I'm in Philadelphia. Whereabouts in north central FL are you? I have some good friends in Gainesville and Tallahassee.
Gville it is! I used to live in philly, so i have some peeps there. Small world!
did you like living in philly?
I wasnt very happy there but that was my own state of mind as much as anything. Ive enjoyed it more when ive gone back to visit. What do you do there?
I just started a new job - with this rad organization that works with high school students.
I also play on a soccer team and write fiction. What do you do in Gainesville?
I do electrical work for money. For joy i do pretty much anything involving water, especially diving & paddlin. I like travel & i'm also pretty civicly engaged.
Whats the org you work for?
I love anything involving water , too.
Nice! I remember them. Do you know jim hardy?
I know who he is! I don't know him well. Is he a friend of yours?
